title: Saradomin Strike

properties.name: description
properties.value: Saradomin Strike is a spell that requires level 60 Magic to cast and can deal a maximum of 20 damage. Saradomin Strike lowers the target's Prayer level by one point on each successful cast. Players must have completed Mage Arena I and be wielding a Saradomin staff or staff of light to use this spell, and only the latter is able to autocast it. When cast, this spell appears similar to the enchanted effect of Opal bolts (e).

Saradomin Strike
Released 22 September 2003 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 60
Spellbook Standard
Type Combat
Experience 35
Element God
Damage • 20
Charged & Saradomin cape worn:
• 30
Runes 4 2 2
Casting speed 5 ticks
Quest Mage Arena
Description Summons the power of Saradomin
Animation
Sound Effect

Saradomin Strike is a spell that requires level 60 Magic to cast and can deal a maximum of 20 damage. Saradomin Strike lowers the target's Prayer level by one point on each successful cast. Players must have completed Mage Arena I and be wielding a Saradomin staff or staff of light to use this spell, and only the latter is able to autocast it. When cast, this spell appears similar to the enchanted effect of Opal bolts (e).

The maximum damage inflicted by the spell increases to 30 hitpoints while the Charge spell is in effect and the player is wearing a Saradomin cape. Each time the spell hits, it lowers the enemy's prayer points by 1. This can be effective when doing PvP activities. Like other prayer draining attacks, it doesn't affect NPCs.

While a rune-providing staff cannot be used with this spell, a tome of fire will provide unlimited fire runes. However, it will not receive the 50% damage boost given by the tome, nor will charges from the tome be consumed.

Cost[edit | edit source]

Spell cost
InputCost
224746
Combo runes
224750
242748
241,168
2421,014
2241,238
Off-hands
24736

Note that since Saradomin Strike requires a Saradomin staff or staff of light, rune-providing staves cannot be used. However, a tome of fire can be worn to provide infinite fire runes.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 November 2021
(update)

The word "strike" in the spellbook tab is now capitalised.

7 March 2019
(update | poll)

The icon was graphically updated to be more distinct from the other god spells.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Saradomin priests and Saradomin-aligned Spiritual mages use Saradomin Strike to attack
  • The Wise Old Man is a noteable user of this spell. This is seen during the Draynor bank robbery cutscene and many more cutscenes of him.
